RATING 4.0 Springfield Family Restaurant Fast Food, Catering 2222 S Campbell Ave., Springfield (417) 883-0900 LATEST REVIEW The food was lousy. The service lousy. The waitress hardly spoke with us. We ordered the chicken pecan salad but they used ice berg lettuce not the field greens that the menu said. No apologies or explanation. The chicken was old and soaked in ...
